mapper.select: SELECT qno, qcno, id, name, title, TO_CHAR(regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as dbday, hit, open, num FROM (SELECT qno, qcno, id, name, title, regdate, hit, open, rownum as num FROM (SELECT qno, qcno, id, name, title, regdate, hit, open FROM qna2 WHERE qcno=#{qcno} ORDER BY qno DESC)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
